roleset.name: wash, disguising an illicit source

example.name: apparently no one launders clothes anymore
example.text: A witness set to testify on Thursday was quoted in a news report over the weekend as saying Lincoln ``laundered'' campaign contributions illegally.

example.name: arg1
example.text: The solicitor will also ask for source and proof of deposit as part of their Money Laundering checks , so it 's not as if you can even " play dumb " with a lender .
